high_descs: Head around and walk towards the desk.
Pick up the saltshaker from the table.
Show it in front of the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the SaltShaker by the light of a DeskLamp.

high_descs: Turn around and move one step then turn left and go to the desk to your left.
Pick up the saltshaker from the table
Turn around and move one step then turn right walk straight to the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the SaltShaker on the DeskLamp.

high_descs:
Turn around turn right go straight to the desk  
Take the salt  shaker from the table 
Turn around  go straight walk near to the desk lamp
turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a salt  shaker by the light of a tall lamp.
